What are the treatments for citrullinemia ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of citrullinemia:  - Baby's First Test: Citrullinemia, Type I  - Baby's First Test: Citrullinemia, Type II  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Citrin Deficiency  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Citru
